official_title: A bill to amend section 1725 of title 18, United States Code, to permit newspapers and magazines on which no postage has been paid to be deposited in letter boxes.

summary.text: Amends the Federal criminal code to make inapplicable to newspapers and magazines the current prohibition against depositing mailable matter on which no postage has been paid into letter boxes.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 1725 of title 18, United States Code, to permit newspapers and magazines on which no postage has been paid to be deposited in letter boxes.
